thread.title: Sushmita Sen to judge Miss Universe pageant 2016
thread.title_full: Sushmita Sen to judge Miss Universe pageant 2016

author: Rappler.com
title: Sushmita Sen to judge Miss Universe pageant 2016
text:
Sushmita Sen to judge Miss Universe pageant 2016 The first Miss Universe from India is coming to Manila Published 10:42   10:42   COMING TO MANILA. Miss Universe 1994 Sushmita Sen is returning to the Philippines to judge the Miss Universe 2016 competition. Screengrab from Instagram/@sushmitasen47 
MANILA, Philippines – Miss Universe 1994 Sushmita Sen is returning to the Philippines to be one of the judges in the Miss Universe pageant. 
Sushmita confirmed this on Instagram on Saturday, January 21. 
"Getting ready with a dancing heart! I am so excited, emotional, and looking forward to returning home to the Philippines after 23 years. It's where it all began," said Sushmita, using the hashtags "#manila1994" and "#missuniverse1994." 
The pageant's coronation night at the Mall of Asia Arena is on January 30. 
One of the most-loved Miss Universe queens in the '90s, Sushmita made history when she was crowned the first Indian Miss Universe in 1994 by Miss Universe 1993 Dayanara Torres at the pageant held in Manila. 
"Life comes a full circle, from winning Miss Universe, to having owned its Indian Franchise to now...returning back to [Manila] this time as a [judge] at the 65th Miss Universe pageant!" continued Sushmita on Instagram. 
"To all my Filipino friends who have been graciously asking...I can now confirm... yes! I am coming!!! Mahal kita (I love you) Philippines. See you soon!" A photo posted by Sushmita Sen (@sushmitasen47) on Jan 20, 2017 at 5:08pm PST 
Sushmita previously posted a throwback photo of her wearing the crown. A photo posted by Sushmita Sen (@sushmitasen47) on May 20, 2016 at 12:55pm PDT 
India won another Miss Universe title in 2000, courtesy of Lara Dutta. 
After her reign as Miss Universe, Sushmita became a Bollywood actress. She is now a mother to two adopted girls. – Rappler.com Miss Universe 2016 is powered by PLDT Home Fibr, Home’s most powerful broadband, now reaching 2.5 Million homes. As low as P1,899. Visit www.pldthome.com.
